Worked within the Engineering Department configuring new customer accounts for network use. Among the configurations provisioned were geographic server footprints, ssl vetting and validation, nginx custom configurations, Apache configurations, FTP users, Apache rewrites, DNS zone files and rules.Worked on a globally distributed CDN of over 15,000 servers and 60 geographically distributed POPsProvided support for HTTP/HTTPS delivery, squid caching, HDS/HLS/MSS, Flash Media Server, Windows Media Server, Wowza Media Server, primarily utilizing CentOS/FreeBSD/Ubuntu.Responsible for project management and completions for standardization of network configurations files, developing and publishing training documentation and walkthroughs, and reclamation of unused space on network devices.Created and delivered training modules to assist colleagues in learning the provisioning aspect of network configurations, while helping to understand how these configurations are used in correlation with product delivery.Wrote and executed shell scripts to aid in configuration changes and maintenance ( performing system-wide changes, configuration changes, etc.)

Worked within the NOC directly with Engineering and Development teams as a Tier 2 Analyst.. Worked on a globally distributed CDN of over 15,000 servers and 60 geographically distributed POPsProvided support for HTTP/HTTPS delivery, squid caching, HDS/HLS/MSS, Flash Media Server, Windows Media Server, Wowza Media Server, primarily utilizing CentOS/FreeBSD/Ubuntu.Responsible for monitoring the infrastructure and network, responding appropriately to alerts and proactively adjusting monitoring systems to keep the network visibility at an acceptable level. Created and delivered training modules to assist colleagues in learning the network infrastructure and means of triaging and correcting issues in the network.Wrote and executed shell scripts to aid in configuration changes and maintenance (restarting services, performing system-wide changes, configuration changes, etc.)

Assisted Customers with management of their web servers (Windows/Linux) by adding/removing users, domains, email, databases and all facets of maintenance. summary: I have worked in the Internet Industry for over 20 years, becoming more and more connected with different aspects of the entire community. As a continuing student in the field, I strive to connect my education in Sociology and Political Science with the mainstream of this Growing Global Community. Within the last few years, I have had a stern focus on developing my skills with Cloud Storage, CDN Delivery and architecture as well as some fundamental Networking. Specialties: Branding and Identity, Server Architecture, Internet Connectivity, Cloud Storage, CDN Delivery Services, Git, Consultation and Curriculum,
